response_text: Unfortunately, I couldn't locate the explicit pricing page URL for Buy Me a Coffee's offerings on their official website. You might try navigating directly on their site [here](https://buymeacoffee.com) or their [help center](https://help.buymeacoffee.com) for detailed information. pricing_data.pricing_notes: The platform offers a free tier for basic usage and subscription options for additional features.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Basic features for creators to receive support.
Advanced features for creators to offer memberships.

extracted_content.content:
Support
-------

Give your audience  
an easy way to say thanks.
-----------------------------------------------

### Buy Me a Coffee makes supporting fun and easy. In just a couple of taps, your fans can make the payment (buy you a coffee) and leave a message.

Buy Juliet a coffee

☕

1

3

5

1

Say something nice...

Support $3

![Image 1: creator](https://cdn.buymeacoffee.com/assets/img/homepage/images/creator_thumbnail_2.png) Anie bought 10 coffees

❤

💯

👋

Memberships
-----------

Start a membership for  
your biggest fans.
-------------------------------------------

### Earn a recurring income by accepting monthly or yearly subscriptions. Share exclusive content, or just give them a way to support your work on an ongoing basis.

![Image 2: creator](https://cdn.buymeacoffee.com/assets/img/homepage/images/membership_banner_2.png)

Pro membership$15/month

Support me on a monthly basis

Email alert for new posts

Exclusive posts and messages

Join

![Image 3: creator](https://cdn.buymeacoffee.com/assets/img/homepage/images/membership_banner_1.png)

Basic membership$5/month

33% OFF all my eBooks & services

Access to members-only Discord

Exclusive posts and messages

Join

![Image 4: creator](https://cdn.buymeacoffee.com/assets/img/homepage/images/membership_banner_3.png)

Advanced membership$25/month

Monthly printable journal pages

Email alert for new posts

Work in progress updates

Join

![Image 5: creator](https://cdn.buymeacoffee.com/assets/img/homepage/images/creator_group_1.png)286Members

$1,500Earned this month

![Image 6: Memberships](https://cdn.buymeacoffee.com/assets/img/homepage/images/membership_mobile_v8.png)

Shop
----

Introducing Shop,  
the creative way to sell.
---------------------------------------------

### The things you’d like to sell probably do not belong in a Shopify store. Shop is designed from the ground up with creators in mind. Whether it’s a 1-1 Zoom call, art commissions, or an ebook, Shop is for you.

.PDF

Design E- book

$200

4.9 (36)

Buy

One-tap checkout

753Sales

One-tap checkout

Liked it? give rating

4 star

$244Earnings

![Image 7: Shops](https://cdn.buymeacoffee.com/assets/img/homepage/images/shops_mobile_v8.png)

Posts, audio & email
--------------------

Publish your best work
----------------------

### Buy Me a Coffee makes it easy to publish free and exclusive content. Try different formats such as audio, and make it members-only to drive more memberships.

![Image 8: Posts](https://cdn.buymeacoffee.com/assets/img/homepage/images/posts_v8.png)

![Image 9: Posts](https://cdn.buymeacoffee.com/assets/img/homepage/images/posts_mobile_v8.png)

Designed for creators,  
not for businesses.
--------------------------------------------

### We don't call them "customers" or transactions. They are your supporters.

### You have 100% ownership of your supporters. We never email them, and you can export the list any time you like.

### You get to talk to a human for help, or if you just like some advice to hit the ground running.

### You get paid instantly to your bank account. No more 30-day delays.

Make 20% or more,  
compared to other platforms.
------------------------------------------------

Buy Me a Coffee is the best way for creators and artists to accept support and membership from their fans.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing includes one-time support options and subscription memberships with varying benefits.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Access to members-only Discord, exclusive posts and messages, and discounts on eBooks and services.
Support on a monthly basis with exclusive posts and messages.
